name: No More Tasks
description:
NOTE: This game requires access to your microphone. The game is played entirely with your voice.

You are at your 9-to-5 office job. You boss keeps overloading you with more and more useless tasks driving you mad, but you've had enough. Shout "NO" to reject any more stupid tasks.

This is a joke game  done in just 3 hours for the Trijam #157, with the theme  "The angriest protagonist".

This game was made re-using the emoji engine used in Balloon and Cacti, and contains no assets other than code.

NOTE: The graphics might look different depending on your system emojis.
